revision.text:
==Maximizing EV Gain== [[Pokerus|EV Gain]] is affected by the Rowap berry. Use the following setup to increase the amount of EVs you gain in all applicable situations by 2.54x. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ '''''Maximum EV Gain Bonus: 2.54x''''' |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 20%;" | [[File:Rowap.png|30px]]
